abstract: NYCO Renaissance, group seeking to revive defunct New York City Opera, receives support from committee of unsecured creditors in opera's bankruptcy case and files reorganization proposal in United States Bankruptcy Court; rival group New Vision for NYC Opera plans to submit its own proposal soon.
lead_paragraph: NYCO Renaissance, one of two groups hoping to reorganize City Opera, has filed a joint proposal in bankruptcy court with unsecured creditors in the case.

headline.main: Plan to Revive New York City Opera Has Creditors’ Backing
headline.print_headline: Plan to Revive City Opera Has Creditors’ Backing

snippet: NYCO Renaissance, one of two groups hoping to reorganize City Opera, has filed a joint proposal in bankruptcy court with unsecured creditors in the case.
